recommendations: “I know Shamini to be a woman with a high degree of integrity, passion and grit. I admire her complete dedication to her values of family, friendships and environmental sustainability. She is generous, thoughtful and authentic. Her passion to put her values into practice with Dhana, Inc. is beyond commendable. She has been a visionary in circular fashion and continues to persevere through the challenges of educating the greater world on the importance of revolutionizing the fashion industry for the better good. I am proud to know Shamini and support her in her endeavors.” Show less
